text: ٱللَّهُ لَطِيفٌۢ بِعِبَادِهِۦ يَرْزُقُ مَن يَشَآءُ ۖ وَهُوَ ٱلْقَوِىُّ ٱلْعَزِيزُ

translation.en.sahih: Allah is Subtle with His servants; He gives provisions to whom He wills. And He is the Powerful, the Exalted in Might.
translation.id.indonesian: Allah Maha lembut terhadap hamba-hamba-Nya; Dia memberi rezeki kepada yang di kehendaki-Nya dan Dialah Yang Maha Kuat lagi Maha Perkasa.
